data.meta_description: William R. McDonald Funeral Home provides funeral, memorial, personalization, aftercare, pre-planning and cremation services in Stratford, Connecticut.
data.text:
William R. McDonald Funeral Home Welcomes You

When you have experienced the loss of a loved one, you can trust us to guide you through the arrangements necessary to create a meaningful ceremony that celebrates the unique life being honored. Our staff is committed to providing your family with the highest quality care and service in your time of need, and we take pride in our responsibility to lighten your burden as you take the first steps toward healing.

Important update regarding Coronavirus (COVID-19)

Dear Families and Friends,

As part of our precautions to limit exposure and prevent further spread of the virus, we have put into place enhanced cleaning procedures, paying special attention to high-touch surfaces such as doorknobs and restrooms. Our primary concern is the safety of our families we serve, the public and our staff. If you are not feeling well, we encourage you to stay home. Please share online messages to families on our website. If you prefer to send a private message, please send it to our email address at mcdonaldfh@optonline.net and we will be happy to forward to the family. Our staff remains committed to providing families with the highest quality care and service in time of need, while respecting the unique challenges brought by the coronavirus. We encourage everyone to follow the CDC recommendations to help prevent the spread of illness at www.CDC.gov. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us (203-378-0758). Thank you for your understanding and patience as we all navigate through this challenging time.

The McDonald Family
